original_query: SELECT t.id, ci.person_id FROM cast_info AS ci, company_name AS cn, keyword AS k, movie_companies AS mc, movie_keyword AS mk, name AS n, title AS t WHERE k.keyword ='colorized-film' AND n.name LIKE '%Bert%' AND n.id = ci.person_id AND ci.movie_id = t.id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND mk.keyword_id = k.id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND mc.company_id = cn.id AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND mc.movie_id = mk.movie_id
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT movie_keyword.movie_id AS E5_movie_id,movie_keyword.keyword_id AS E5_keyword_id FROM movie_keyword AS movie_keyword
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT keyword.id AS E3_id FROM keyword AS keyword WHERE keyword.keyword = 'colorized-film'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5_stage1_0 AS SELECT * FROM E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E5.E5_keyword_id=E3.E3_id)
CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT cast_info.person_id AS E1_person_id,cast_info.movie_id AS E1_movie_id FROM cast_info AS cast_info
CREATE VIEW E7 AS SELECT title.id AS E7_id FROM title AS title
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1_stage1_0 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E7 WHERE E1.E1_movie_id=E7.E7_id)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT name.id AS E6_id FROM name AS name WHERE name.name LIKE '%Bert%'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1_stage1_1 AS SELECT * FROM E1_stage1_0 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1_stage1_0.E1_person_id=E6.E6_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5_stage1_1 AS SELECT * FROM E5_stage1_0 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1_stage1_1 WHERE E5_stage1_0.E5_movie_id=E1_stage1_1.E1_movie_id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT movie_companies.company_id AS E4_company_id,movie_companies.movie_id AS E4_movie_id FROM movie_companies AS movie_companies
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT company_name.id AS E2_id FROM company_name AS company_name
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4_stage1_0 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E4.E4_company_id=E2.E2_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5_stage1_2 AS SELECT * FROM E5_stage1_1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4_stage1_0 WHERE E5_stage1_1.E5_movie_id=E4_stage1_0.E4_movie_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5_stage1_2 WHERE E5_stage1_2.E5_keyword_id=E3.E3_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E1_stage1_1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5_stage1_2 WHERE E5_stage1_2.E5_movie_id=E1_stage1_1.E1_movie_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E7_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E7 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1_stage2_0 WHERE E1_stage2_0.E1_movie_id=E7.E7_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E6_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1_stage2_0 WHERE E1_stage2_0.E1_person_id=E6.E6_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E4_stage1_0 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5_stage1_2 WHERE E5_stage1_2.E5_movie_id=E4_stage1_0.E4_movie_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4_stage2_0 WHERE E4_stage2_0.E4_company_id=E2.E2_id)

CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E_stage3 AS SELECT E1_stage2_0.E1_person_id AS E1_person_id FROM E5_stage1_2, E3_stage2_0, E1_stage2_0, E7_stage2_0, E6_stage2_0, E4_stage2_0, E2_stage2_0 WHERE E5_stage1_2.E5_keyword_id=E3_stage2_0.E3_id AND E1_stage2_0.E1_movie_id=E7_stage2_0.E7_id AND E1_stage2_0.E1_person_id=E6_stage2_0.E6_id AND E5_stage1_2.E5_movie_id=E1_stage2_0.E1_movie_id AND E4_stage2_0.E4_company_id=E2_stage2_0.E2_id AND E5_stage1_2.E5_movie_id=E4_stage2_0.E4_movie_id
SELECT * FROM E_stage3
